body_html:
It might make sense to copy some of the test infrastructure we wrote for numpy-stubs: https://github.com/numpy/numpy-stubs
…

It might make sense to copy some of the test infrastructure we wrote for

body:
It might make sense to copy some of the test infrastructure we wrote for
numpy-stubs: https://github.com/numpy/numpy-stubs
On Thu, Jun 14, 2018 at 7:06 AM Janis Lesinskis <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> We decided to move our attempt at making stubs into an external library to
> make it easier to collaborate:
> https://github.com/persephone-tools/tensorflow-stubs
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you commented.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/12345#issuecomment-397308219>,
> or mute the thread
